title: Victor Chandler Poker Cup
text:
The Victor Chandler Poker Cup (often abbreviated to The Victor Poker Cup or The VC Poker Cup) was a <a href="poker%20tournament">poker tournament</a> held in 2004 and 2005 in <a href="England">England</a> for broadcast on <a href="Sky%20Sports">Sky Sports</a>.
The £5,000 buy-in event commenced in 2004 and is played out in a <a href="betting%20%28poker%29">no limit</a> <a href="Texas%20hold%20%27em">Texas hold 'em</a> format.
2004.
The event was held from 23-24 July in <a href="London">London</a>. 100 competitors took part, with the following making the final table.
The event is noted for featuring three of the four members of <a href="The%20Hendon%20Mob">The Hendon Mob</a> at the same final table, together with John Kabbaj, who is considered their unofficial fifth member.
Other British players who played the event include <a href="Jac%20Arama">Jac Arama</a>, Bruce "Elvis Senior" Atkinson, <a href="Barny%20Boatman">"Barmy" Barny Boatman</a>, <a href="Dave%20Colclough">Dave "El Blondie" Colclough</a>, <a href="Victoria%20Coren">Victoria Coren</a>, <a href="Zac%20Goldsmith">Zac Goldsmith</a>, <a href="Vinnie%20Jones">Vinnie Jones</a>, <a href="John%20McCririck">John McCririck</a>, Grub Smith, <a href="Willie%20Tann">Willie "The Dice Man" Tann</a>, <a href="Simon%20Trumper">Simon "Aces" Trumper</a>, <a href="Dave%20Ulliott">Dave "The Devilfish" Ulliott</a>, <a href="Mickey%20Wernick">Mickey "The Worm" Wernick</a> and <a href="Marty%20Wilson%20%28poker%20player%29">"Mad" Marty Wilson</a>.
Foreign players included <a href="Liam%20Flood">"Gentleman" Liam Flood</a>, <a href="Noel%20Furlong">Noel Furlong</a>, <a href="Tony%20G">Tony G</a>, <a href="Mel%20Judah">Mel "Silver Fox" Judah</a>, <a href="Marcel%20L%C3%BCske">"The Flying Dutchman" Marcel Lüske</a>, <a href="Donnacha%20O%27Dea">"The Don" Donnacha O'Dea</a>, <a href="Padraig%20Parkinson">Padraig Parkinson</a>, <a href="Barry%20Shulman">Barry Shulman</a> and <a href="Charalambos%20Xanthos">Charalambos "Bambos" Xanthos</a>.
2005.
The event was held from 1-5 August in London. 96 competitors took part, with the final 12 competitors progressing to semi-finals.
